comment: Show that the original axiom ~ ax-c10 can be derived from ~ ax6 and ~ axc7 (on top of propositional calculus, ~ ax-gen , and ~ ax-4 ). See ~ ax6fromc10 for the rederivation of ~ ax6 from ~ ax-c10 . Normally, ~ axc10 should be used rather than ~ ax-c10 , except by theorems specifically studying the latter's properties. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
